short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp All-in-One Marketing and Selling Tools with AI
short.id: WhatsApp All-in-One Marketing and Selling Tools dengan AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blast! Scheduled campaign! Send bulk messages to any contacts. Create chatbots with NLP. Extract phone numbers. Integrate with ChatGPT. All side by side in WhatsApp™ Web.

😎 COOL FEATURES YOU WILL LOVE: 
✔ ChatGPT sidebar, side by side with WhatsApp Web
✔ Auto reply chatbot with learning capability
✔ Chatbot with sending image and custom data
✔ Auto greeting chatbot with image and schedule
✔ Chatbot menu and sub menu choices
✔ Blast/send bulk messages.
✔ Scheduled marketing campaign with detailed result.
✔ Send reminder message at once or repeated to contact, group, or status
✔ Manage multiple accounts (team) in one dashboard
✔ Create online shop and catalog with custom theme
✔ Manage order from your online shop in one place
✔ Scrape & extract contacts from groups, communities, labels, or unsaved numbers.
✔ Scrape phone numbers from any web pages.
✔ Quick reply chat with templates.
✔ Custom data collection for broadcast.
✔ Safe broadcast with delay and message rotator/spin.
✔ Integrate with Google Form, Swipe Pages
✔ Webhook and REST API support.
✔ Sync and save your setting in the cloud for FREE.

📝 CHANGELOG 6.7.2:
- Story/status scheduler
- Fix status connection

📅 UPCOMING COOL FEATURES:
- Product catalog import
- Shop analytics
- Delivery service integration
- Payment gateway integration
- Scraping automation

📌 INSTRUCTION:
- REFRESH WhatsApp™ Web if it's not running after installed.
- DISABLE other WhatsApp™ Web extension.
- Latest & manual install: https://wagrab.com/build

Usage of this extension is under WhatsApp™ regulation and limitation. WhatsApp™ is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. WAGrab extension is not related with WhatsApp™ and Meta.
long.id:
Blast! Campaign terjadwal! Kirim banyak pesan ke kontak mana pun. Bikin chatbot canggih dg NLP. Ekstrak nomor hp. Integrasikan dg ChatGPT. Semuanya di WhatsApp™ Web.

😎 FITUR KEREN YG BAKAL KAMU SUKA: 
✔ ChatGPT sidebar, gunakan bareng dg WhatsApp Web
✔ Ajari chatbot supaya bisa otomatis membalas dengan tepat
✔ Chatbot bisa kirim image/button dan data custom dinamis
✔ Chatbot auto greeting dg gambar/tombol dan jadwalnya
✔ Chatbot menu dg sub menu untuk pilihan
✔ Blast/kirim banyak pesan sekaligus.
✔ Marketing campaign terjadwal dg hasil detail.
✔ Kirim pesan pengingat, sekali atau berulang, ke kontak, grup, atau story
✔ Kelola banyak akun (team) di satu dashboard.
✔ Bikin WhatsApp online shop dan catalog, bisa ubah tema.
✔ Manage order dari online shop-mu di satu tempat
✔ Scrape & extract kontak dari grup, komunitas, label, nomor belum tersimpan.
✔ Scrape nomor hp dari halaman website mana pun.
✔ Quick reply chat dengan template.
✔ Custom data collection untuk broadcast.
✔ Broadcast aman dg delay dan rotasi/spin pesan.
✔ Integrasi dg Google Form, Swipe Pages.
✔ Mendukung webhook dan REST API.
✔ Sync dan simpan seting di cloud, GRATIS.

📝 CHANGELOG 6.7.1:
- Story/status scheduler

📅 FITUR KEREN SEGERA HADIR:
- Product catalog import
- Shop analytics
- Delivery service integration
- Payment gateway integration
- Scraping automation

📌 PETUNJUK:
- REFRESH WhatsApp™ Web jika ga jalan setelah install.
- DISABLE WhatsApp™ Web extension lainnya.
- Latest & manual install: https://wagrab.com/build

Penggunaan extension ini berada di bawah regulasi dan keterbatasan WhatsApp™ Web. WhatsApp™ is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. WAGrab extension tidak memiliki hubungan dengan WhatsApp™ atau Meta.
